bibl.title: The Tyrant Goddess: Herodas's Fifth Mime.
bibl.note: Earlier versions of this paper were presented at Brown University, the University of California at Berkeley, and Stanford University. The world represented in Herondas's mimes, and specifically in the fifth, may be seen as a systematic inversion of the ideology of the Classical city-state.
bibl.seg: Konstan David, The Tyrant Goddess: Herodas's Fifth Mime.

Earlier versions of this paper were presented at Brown University, the University of California at Berkeley, and Stanford University. The world represented in Herondas's mimes, and specifically in the fifth, may be seen as a systematic inversion of the ideology of the Classical city-state.
